The Certified Public Accountant of Kenya (CPA) examinations are administered by KASNEB. The examinations cover the following areas.

-   Financial Reporting.

-   Management Accounting.

-   Taxation.

-   Auditing.

-   Financial Management and Analysis.

The details are available on this [site](https://www.ifac.org/about-ifac/membership/members/institute-certified-public-accountants-kenya) <https://www.ifac.org/about-ifac/membership/members/institute-certified-public-accountants-kenya>
